DOC.brief_summary: This study is a biomedical, open label, therapeutic strategy, interventional, non-randomized, multicenter study to evaluate the non compliance to antimalarials in patients with systemic lupus in the Nord Pas-de-Calais region (FRANCE). It is conducted in two visits. These visits consist in obtaining blood sample, performing a clinical examination and filling in a questionnaire (Quality Of Life, Coping...). The goal for the noncompliants patients is to guide them towards the therapeutic education with professionals (nurses and physicians).
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of Decision and Compliance With Antimalarials in Patients With Systemic Lupus
DOC.criteria: patients with a systemic lupus with ACR criteria (at least 4 criterias) patients with antimalarials for at least 3 months with a minimum dose of 200 mg/day. patients who refuse to sign the informed consent patients who are under guardianship
